"I could have tied this assignment with a bow and finished it on time."
"If only I had tied this assignment with a perfect knot, I would have completed it on schedule."
"I wish I had tied this assignment with a ribbon, so I could have handed it in early."
"If I had tied this assignment with a beautiful bow, I would have had more time to make it perfect."
"I regret not tying this assignment with a knot that would have held it together, so I wouldn't have had to start over."
